code: import React,{Component}from'react';import classNames from'classnames';import rpc from'utils/rpc';const initialState={street:'Вулиця Роуб',zone:'Ла Пуерта',greenZone:false};export default class Location extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state=initialState;}componentDidMount(){rpc.register('HUD-SetLocation',data=>this.setState(data));this.getCurrentLocation();}componentWillUnmount(){rpc.unregister('HUD-SetLocation');}async getCurrentLocation(){const location=await rpc.callClient('getPlayerLocation');this.setState(()=>location);}render(){const{street,zone,greenZone}=this.state;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:classNames('hud_location',{'hud_location--green':greenZone})},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h3",{className:"hud_location-street"},street),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",{className:"hud_location-zone"},zone));}}
